text: Check of completeness of Use Case form conducted by
Person(s) responsible for the Feasibility Assessment

info: e.g. yes (analytical package); no (cohort study would be using PS matching/weighting)
Are there any guidelines/recommendations of state-of-the-art methods that will be used or tested against?

Which analytical methods would you recommend to use for this study? What would be their limitations? Is the analytical method (incl. statistical code/packages) available or would it needed to be developed?
e.g. %FTE of X staff members working on the study
Is there a specific contribution (FC/in-kind) available if this use case would be conducted?

text: Would any extra efford be needed that incures additional costs?
info: e.g. mapping of non-OMOP data, mapping medical devices
What would be the estimated timeline for completion of the study?
What would be feasible timelines for completion of the study and how many resources would be needed?
To be completed with the UC setting needs, e.g., primary care
To be completed with the UC temporal needs, e.g., data from > 2021, data from <2010
To be completed with the UC geographical needs, e.g., data from southern European countries
To be completed with the UC data domains needs, e.g., conditions, drugs, and procedures.
